2024 Healthcare Common Procedure Coding System (HCPCS)

Source: R/databases.R
level2.Rd

2024 Healthcare Common Procedure Coding System (HCPCS)

Usage

level2(hcpcs = NULL)

Arguments

hcpcs

description

Value

a dplyr::tibble()

Examples

level2(c("A0021", "V5362", "J9264", "G8916")) |>
dplyr::glimpse()
#> Rows: 4
#> Columns: 21
#> $ hcpcs             <chr> "A0021", "G8916", "J9264", "V5362"

#> $ short_description <chr> "Outside state ambulance serv", "Pt w iv ab given on…

#> $ mcm               <chr> NA, NA, NA, NA
#> $ statute           <chr> NA, NA, NA, "1862(a)(7)"
#> $ labcert           <chr> NA, NA, NA, NA
#> $ xref              <chr> "A0030", NA, NA, NA
#> $ cov               <chr> "I", "C", "C", "S"

#> $ asc_dt            <date> NA, NA, 2008-01-01, NA
#> $ procnote          <chr> NA, NA, NA, NA
#> $ betos             <chr> "O1A", "M5B", "O1E", "O1F"
#> $ tos               <chr> "D", "1", "1:P", "1:W"
#> $ date_added        <date> 1985-01-01, 2012-04-01, 2006-01-01, 1990-01-01
